title: How do you record LoL games on mac?
body:
How can you record LoL games on mac? I already tried using op.gg but when I do "sh *file*" it says no file found.

Thanks, help appreciated.

replies.body:
Anybody got an answer for this? 
Lol =3

use op.gg
this is a guide on how to record: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R3Mbp4_KN34
Im not sure how to replay though because the replay files format will be .bat and im not very sure if Mac will support .bat files. You can either buy a cheap windows laptop or buy a Windows OS and install it on mac with bootcamp or you can find a way to watch the replays.
Oh i don't do youtube its just for when i do start one xD i really do but i have no clue how to upload and I'm busy mainly all week so no time for it too upload yeh aha

I have i Macbook Air, i use QuickTime Player
Open it will be in launch pad, Go file or right click on the quicktime player icon on dock, then press new screen capture, then it will come up where you press and drag over the screen to record the whole screen. And there captured your game you can save it etc.
